flawed_nl_solution:
Greta the goose eats 20/10=<<20/10=2>>2 pounds of food per day.
Milton the mouse eats (1/100)*2=200 of a pound of food per day.
Elmer the elephant eats 4000*(200)=<<4000*(200)=800000>>800000 pounds of food per day.
Thus, Elmer eats 800000-20=799980 pounds more food per day than does Penelope the pig.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.02, not 200.0. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
